page.title: 06HOW IT USED TO BE-1.
page.content: On Monday we interviewed Joe Spry.Joe Spry used to come to this school.There were {114}children.They had to learn their tables every day.There were 3 teachers.He said they were alright.He left at the age of 12 and went to grammer school at Tavistock.Children came to this school from as far away as Mill_Hill and Brentor.He left Grammar school at 14. He used to play football ,conkers marbles and spinning tops.The playground was separated for boys and girls.He used to shop at a shop which is now a house.I live there.He also shopped at Tavistock market.A butcher's cart came round the village once a week.He went shopping when he had the money.He could get{1 pound of {sweets for 1/2p.
